title: Pineapple Express 2 Blood Red
description: Red has become a drug lord in Ted Jones’ absence, but Woody Harrelson is threatening it all by promoting legal weed. Stoners Dale and Saul must assassinate Woody… or be assassinated themselves.
quote: I smoked weed with Steve Jobs, and that’s when he came up with the iPad.
altHero: amateur footage of Dale and Saul driving a fake car
alt1: Dale and Saul chatting on a couch
alt2: Jonah Hill as Woody Harrelson, wearing a cowboy hat and holding a bong
alt3: Dale and Saul chat with Red who is holding a baseball bat like a gun, a pile of cocaine on the table in front of them
alt4: Matheson (Robinson) drives a fake car (using a pot lid as a steering wheel) while Red holds his baseball bat gun
